name: Fizzy Energy Drink
tooltip:
Fizzy Energy Drink
Item Level 1
Binds when picked up
Duration: 7 days
Use: Restores 840.0 health and 1260 mana over 21 sec.  Must remain seated while eating.  If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become refreshed and gain 6 Mana every 5 seconds for 15 min.
Max Stack: 20
Sell Price: 3
